testcase.name: soap 1.1 payload from external file TestCase 1

failure.message: Karate08_soap_externalFilevalidation_assignment.feature:12 - status code was: 500, expected: 200, response time: 1460, url: https://ecs.syr.edu/faculty/fawcett/Handouts/cse775/code/calcWebService/Calc.asmx, response: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><soap:Body><soap:Fault><faultcode>soap:Client</faultcode><faultstring>Server was unable to read request. ---> There is an error in XML document (4, 23). ---> Input string was not in a correct format.</faultstring><detail/></soap:Fault></soap:Body></soap:Envelope>

testcase.failure:
